task.summary: Default task
crime level works.
crime level works.
made the overlays only allow a single active selection
added software licenses and the about window to display them.
added testers to the about window :D
fixed stupid bug where android was unable to parse the http responses, so everything using http fell over.
added ability to go back in the web dialog
added the close button to the web dialog
added the close button to the web dialog
lots of refactoring and rejiggering of platform specific code
fixed a blending bug and removed the notion of "non-blocking" api requests, handle them with background tasks if needed on a case by case basis
made the desktop connection monitor use a thread so it can periodically check added an audio control to all splash screens so players are happy if they hate nice things.
FIXED THE STUPID ANDROID HTTP CLIENT SHIT
added display mode setting to the desktop version
added display mode setting to the desktop version
removed the debug button, added screenshot
some clean up
moved the screenshot code
get rid of the android play licensing stuff
started working on android billing
started working on android billing
added secure preferences
LIMITED vs UNLIMITED version limitations are now in place.
removed security issue with secure prefs logging everything, lol? added better display settings to about box.
removed security issue with secure prefs logging everything, lol? added better display settings to options window.
fixed the bug where it was impossible to quit on OSX without crashing and burning.
fixed a bug on the about window where it would scroll on the X axis
sending payment information to the server works
new dialog class
switched every dialog over to newer style
converted options window to a dialog
fixed a bug where changing the display mode in libgdx would send resize events every frame (wtfbbq?)
removed my patch because latest libgdx nightlies fixed the resize event bug
fixed a font loading bug introduced by latest libgdx nightlies
new tower is now a dialog
slightly altered the load window, added last time played
license files now are handled similarly to the assets list due to the limitation on FileHandle.list() on desktop platforms.
tweaked the gui skin to match jelly bean
lots of gui tweaking for different screen sizes
lots of bug fixes syncing games works pretty well now via tasks load tower window waits for sync to complete before display list
fixed some asset loading bugs fixed the audio control on HD splash screens

option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
option.value: fixed some asset loading bugs fixed the audio control on HD splash screens
